HiddenText.Name: I am not able to be a Speaking Partner anymore; what do I do?
HiddenText.OpenningText: I am not able to be a Speaking Partner anymore; what do I do?
HiddenText.BodyCopy: If you are participating in the Speaking Partner program as part of a course at BYU-Idaho, you should speak to your professor. Otherwise, contact the Speaking Partner managers to explain your situation.
